name: Solar Group Inc AM20KV01 Venetian Bronze Armory Locking Mailbox
categoryPath: Home Improvement/Hardware/Home Hardware/Door Hardware & Accessories/Mailboxes & Address Plaques

reviews.name: Solar Group Inc AM20KV01 Venetian Bronze Armory Locking Mailbox
reviews.reviewText: I had some items stolen out of my old non-locking mailbox. I feel more secure with this locking mailbox. Someone could still break in if they tried hard enough, but it will stop the quick opportunistic theft by someone just walking by.
reviews.title: I feel more secure about my mail

reviews.name: Solar Group Inc AM20KV01 Venetian Bronze Armory Locking Mailbox
reviews.reviewText: The unit could be built a little more sturdy but overall a good value.
reviews.title: Great mailbox

reviews.name: Solar Group Inc AM20KV01 Venetian Bronze Armory Locking Mailbox
reviews.reviewText: The box seems to be well constructed and is attractive. The only problem is that the combination locking mechanism is apparently faulty and we were unable to open the locked compartment. We did diligently follow the instructions. The mailbox is being returned.
reviews.title: feedback on solar group venetian locking mailbox
